title: *** Error in `/bin/python3.5': munmap_chunk(): invalid pointer ***
body:
Trying to generate shap_values from a TreeExplainer(GBM) fails with the invalid pointer error.

I am using SHAP in a Flask app running on gunicorn inside a RHEL minimal docker container. I have all the dependencies installed and have tried running with multiple version of SHAP.

`shap.TreeExplainer(model).shap_values(df)`

Would appreciate if someone could point me in a direction to solve the problem. 

